db:abstract.db:para: The Menus example demonstrates the use of QMenuBar and QStatusBar in a QMainWindow to implement an in-place active control.

db:article.db:para: To build the example you must first build the QAxServer library. Then run qmake and your make tool in examples/activeqt/menus.
The demonstration requires your WebBrowser to support ActiveX controls, and scripting to be enabled.
